question: girls only..........!!!!?
question_content: ok so i've tried wearing a tampon a couple times and the first time, i bleed all over myself  and the second time it hurt really bad. and it was so uncomfortable, expecially when i sat down on a hard surface..... i have been using pads ever since, but i was just wondering if thats normal, or should i be woried??

answers.answer_content: oh hun it's fine. tampons are very uncomfortable the first few times and it's definitely normal. some girls just find it more comfortable wearing pad.

It took me a long time to start using tampons (probably 2 years into me period) just because I was scared it would hurt, and it did. It does get better after a little while but the only way its going to get better is if you keep trying it :( I still use slimfits and I'm 20 years old. Try and keep trying, switch brands and see if you like anything more the others, I personally like regular playtex, although I recently tried tampaz cardboards (trying to be enviromentaly friendly) and it wasn't all that bad- once you get used to it you will quite happy you stuck with it I think, its a loaaad more convient and comfortable.
If you bled all over the place then you are using a lower asorbancy than you need to. So try using a bigger tampon or just change them more often. It takes practice to put tampons in correctly.

Totally normal, I only wear a tampon if I am swimming. If you just started it takes a while to put one in. Try Platex Sport Regular. They work really well for me! Sometimes my period is so heavy I have to wear Kotex Maxi Overnight Pads with Wings...
First off, use a tampon after bathing, it will be less messy.  If you can feel it, it is not far enough in.  You can't feel a tampon if it is inserted properly.  Good luck, you'll figure it out!
You are normal.  If they hurt when you sit down then you are either too dry or you didn't put it in quite far enough.
You probably didn't have it in right. When used correctly you shouldn't even feel them.
you didnt put it in far enough........and no dont worry its the most common mistake
